messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I'm kind of unable to speak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a number of squeaking things have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Locker Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: If-f y-you find-d m-m-my-y cat-t t-tel-l-l-ll-l-l m-me

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Experimentation Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Wack is probably dead, we have a cult problem. Im guessing there are gangs and syndicate. Well shit. Im just anonymous in the situation. Please let me not get sucked into this shit. I need a drink.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Due to oncumming viruses we must call the shuttle.
